festival.introText:
Equinox Festival - Bringing the tribes together for the best end of season party in the Universe?

Three live music venues - the Crispy Disco Stage, dedicated to one of the original members of the tribe, Crispian Baker; the ever-popular solar powered Soundscape Stage, and The Big Dub Pub!

Two dance tents - Sunrise bringing you the best Psydub/Tech, Lunar with banging Jungle/DnB and crazy decor and stage shows.

Featuring fire shows, workshops and heritage crafts, campaigns, walkabout entertainers, chill out areas, healing area, the big central fire and of course our Children's Area to keep the little ones entertained.

Our food traders will be offering a variety of street food for vegans, vegetarians and meat-eaters alike and tempting you with sweet treats and drinks. We also have a selection of stalls with clothes, handmade crafts and jewellery, circus toys, hair braiding, glitter and face painting and everything in between.

So come join us, show your support for the festival that just won't stop and the collective tribe that you are part of each September.

 

Equinox Festival - Bringing the tribes together for the best end of season party in the Universe?

Three live music venues - the Crispy Disco Stage, dedicated to one of the original members of the tribe, Crispian Baker; the ever-popular solar powered Soundscape Stage, and The Big Dub Pub!

Two dance tents - Sunrise bringing you the best Psydub/Tech, Lunar with banging Jungle/DnB and crazy decor and stage shows.

Featuring fire shows, workshops and heritage crafts, campaigns, walkabout entertainers, chill out areas, healing area, the big central fire and of course our Children's Area to keep the little ones entertained.

Our food traders will be offering a variety of street food for vegans, vegetarians and meat-eaters alike and tempting you with sweet treats and drinks. We also have a selection of stalls with clothes, handmade crafts and jewellery, circus toys, hair braiding, glitter and face painting and everything in between.

So come join us, show your support for the festival that just won't stop and the collective tribe that you are part of each September.

 

Welcome to Equinox!
festival.descriptionText: Skiddle is an official ticket outlet for Equinox Festival 2023. Get Equinox Festival tickets, news and information with Skiddle.com

reviews.title: Review of Equinox Festival 2022
reviews.body: Was trouble free as far as I witnessed! The hard work of those involved in the build was evident, this was my 2nd year here and I am hoping to be in a position to go and help with the setup next year. The location is awesome and the festy site feels intimate, being split into half a dozen or more individual stages/tents,that's 3 dance tents, a big top with both DJ's and bands plus 2 decent sized live stages with both enthusiastic new bands and artists through to seasoned festival favourites,such as dub act Mungos HiFi and Anarcho punk-ska stalwarts Culture Shock and Inner Terrestrials who closed the main stage in fine style on the Sunday. One of the friendliest festivals I've ever been to and I will be keeping in touch with many of the punters and crew.

reviews.title: Review of Equinox Festival 2022
reviews.body: Best festival ever!!! Keep as is and DONT CHANGE A THING!!!

reviews.title: Review of Equinox Festival 2022
reviews.body: Brilliant Little festival something for everyone and everything within easy reach . Great food , awesome vibes brilliant people and outstanding music.  couldn't rate highly enough !

faqs.question: When is Equinox Festival 2023?
faqs.answer: Equinox Festival returns to Chalk Farm on Friday September 15th to Monday September 18th 2023.

faqs.question: How much are Equinox Festival tickets?
faqs.answer:
Tickets including camping start from £105 plus booking fee.

With campervans starting from £30 plus booking fee.

faqs.question: How do I get to Equinox Festival?
faqs.answer:
By Taxi - There are several local taxi firms to choose from. It is recommended that you use the taxi firms to travel from the train station and bus stops to avoid walking on the roads if you are carrying a lot of camping equipment. 

By Car - If travelling by car please use the postcode until you reach the festival road signs then follow them for the remainder of your journey. If travelling from the North you will be joining the M180 towards Scunthorpe/ Grimsby and if travelling from the South you will travel towards Lincoln following the A158 / Wragby Road E to A157. 

By Bus - The Interconnect 51 bus is running regular routes across the weekend. 

By Rail - The closest rail station is Grimsby Town.

faqs.question: Accessibility information
faqs.answer:
General Site Info: Chalk Farm is a greenfield site- mainly flat but there are sloping areas and it can become muddy, meaning that sometimes access across the site is not that easy. Please bear this in mind.

Arena Facilities: There are accessible toilets located in the arena.

General Campsite Facilities: The camping area is flat and the arena is easily accessible from most of the camping area. Tent camping is included in weekend ticket price, tickets are also available for campervans, live-ins and caravans.

Accessible Campsite: Please apply on our website equinoxfestival.org.uk Accessible toilets are provided, along with a secure fridge for any medication that may need to be kept cold. Charging facilities for electric wheelchairs or scooters and medical devices.

faqs.question: is there camping available at Equinox Festival?
faqs.answer:
yes, there is camping available within the festival and local campsites are available aswell.

Here is a list of local campsites : 

Waleby

Market Rasen

Lindsey Trail

Dean House

Bainside House

Woodhall Spa

Three Horsehoes

faqs.question: Where is Equinox Festival?
faqs.answer: Equinox Festival is located on Chalk Farm in Louth, Lincolnshire. The postcode is DN36 5RS.

faqs.question: Are pre-payment plan tickets available?
faqs.answer: Yes, Payment Plan tickets are available so you can spread the cost of your ticket over multiple smaller payments. You can find more information about Payment Plans here

faqs.question: What day does the campsite open on at Equinox festival? What time?
faqs.answer:
The campsite will be open 10.00am Friday. There is strictly no admittance before this time. There is no holding area for you to park up in until we open, anyone blocking roads or illegally parking will be reported to the authorities.

 

You are welcome to stay until Midday on Monday.

faqs.question: Does Equinox Festival have any age restrictions?
faqs.answer: As Equinox Festival is a family festival there isn’t an age limit however you may be asked to show photo ID.

faqs.question: What happens If I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer:
Unfortunately, we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent.

Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

faqs.question: are you allowed to camp in a campervan/caravan at Equinox festival?
faqs.answer: Yes, you are able to camp in a campervan/caravan at equinox festival. However, a ticket for this will be required which they advise to purchase this ticket before arrival to the festival.

faqs.question: Can I bring my own food and drink into Equinox Festival?
faqs.answer: You are not allowed to bring your own food and drink into Equinox Festival. There will be a wide variety of food and drink stalls inside the festival, serving up organic, vegetarian and vegan options.

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Equinox Festival 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: Was trouble free as far as I witnessed! The hard work of those involved in the build was evident, this was my 2nd year here and I am hoping to be in a position to go and help with the setup next year. The location is awesome and the festy site feels intimate, being split into half a dozen or more individual stages/tents,that's 3 dance tents, a big top with both DJ's and bands plus 2 decent sized live stages with both enthusiastic new bands and artists through to seasoned festival favourites,such as dub act Mungos HiFi and Anarcho punk-ska stalwarts Culture Shock and Inner Terrestrials who closed the main stage in fine style on the Sunday. One of the friendliest festivals I've ever been to and I will be keeping in touch with many of the punters and crew.

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Equinox Festival 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: Best festival ever!!! Keep as is and DONT CHANGE A THING!!!

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Equinox Festival 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: Brilliant Little festival something for everyone and everything within easy reach . Great food , awesome vibes brilliant people and outstanding music.  couldn't rate highly enough !

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Equinox Festival 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: It's one big family. There is no more friendly place to be free and joyous. I go every year and I'm never disappointed. Thank you to the organisers and all the artists for this incredible opportunity.

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Equinox Festival 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body:
Really beautiful setting. Was worried about bringing my children but it was great and they had a great time.
I did feel abit awkward in the reggae tent at one point as I noticed that all the artists wer white and everyone in there was white. Im white but do love diversity and Im conscious of appropriation. More people of colour- artists and attendees would be good. 
Has a fantastic weekend though x

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Equinox Festival 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: Absolutely banging as always, could do with lights in the toilet though

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Equinox Festival 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body:
Small, but pretty and well organized.
Good vibes throughout

news.title: Equinox Festival 2020 tickets on sale now
news.summary: The Lincolnshire festival will return between 18th - 21st September 2020.

news.title: Equinox Festival tickets available now
news.summary: With an ethos of inclusivity at its core, Equinox Festival tickets are on sale now.

news.title: First wave of line-up announcements for Equinox 2018 begins!
news.summary: Phat Bollard, Back to the Planet, Inner Terrestrials, John Otway, Lacertilia, Nieviem, The Majestic, De Fuego, Mercurius Rising and much more to come!
